Title: La Dolce Vita
Production_Co: Riama Film, Gray-Film, Pathé Consortium Cinéma
Cast: Marcello Mastroianni, Anita Ekberg, Anouk Aimée, Yvonne Furneaux, Magali Noël, Alain Cuny, Annibale Ninchi, Walter Santesso, Lex Barker, Jacques Sernas, Nadia Gray, Valeria Ciangottini, Riccardo Garrone, Ida Galli, Audrey McDonald
Plot: A series of stories following a week in the life of a philandering paparazzo journalist living in Rome. Journalist and man-about-town Marcello struggles to find his place in the world, torn between the allure of Rome's elite social scene and the stifling domesticity offered by his girlfriend, all the while searching for a way to become a serious writer. Written by Jeff Lewis
Keywords: sexy woman, journalist, celebrity, party, italy
Actors: Marcello Mastroianni, Anita Ekberg, Anouk Aimée
Writer: Federico Fellini (story), Ennio Flaiano (story) | 5 more credits »
Description: Directed by Federico Fellini.  With Marcello Mastroianni, Anita Ekberg, Anouk Aimée, Yvonne Furneaux. A series of stories following a week in the life of a philandering paparazzo journalist living in Rome.
